title: Enhancing Practical Software Development Competencies: Foundations of Mathematical Modeling for Landslide Prevention Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Interpret mathematical relationships influencing design variables of landslide prevention structures (micropiles)
Analyze pile spacing and load-bearing distribution ratios through mathematical modeling
Apply principles of shear resistance and load distribution on slip surfaces for safety factor calculations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
